title: harihara thanayuni
sahitya:
hari hara tanayuni smaraNamu jEsina
vara vidula celimi pAvanamE manasA
(hari)

anupallavi

cira kAlamu nA citamuna velayu
paramAtmuDu nI tatvamunu teliya
(hari)

caraNam

shubha karaharapriya sutuDanu nAmA
shabari girirAja deivamA
aparimita bhakti uNDuTa nEramA
viparItamulunu tolaginci brOvu mA
(hari)
